item.title: Machine Learning with Andrew Ng
item.description: i have wnated to delpoy my own deep learning image classification model for some time and the new fasti.ai course gets straight into the nitty gritty in lesson 2 of the deep learning for coders course. You can adapt the code in the fast book notebooks and get a model up and running quickly and easily, in my case that model just wasnt very good initially: rowing images are not well classified on bing, alot of incorrectly classified images and drawings / pictures of empty boats that were bringin down the accuracy scores.
